parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Sounds

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Changes the sound volume smoothly within the given time.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> time '''fadeSound''' volume

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> time: [[Number]] - the time in seconds

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> volume: [[Number]] - sound volume range 0 to 1. Maximum volume is 1. Default is 1.

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>5 [[fadeSound]] 0;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[fadeRadio]], [[fadeSpeech]], [[fadeMusic]], [[fadeEnvironment]], [[environmentVolume]], [[soundVolume]], [[musicVolume]], [[radioVolume]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment>
<dd class="notedate">Posted on January 19, 2010 - 13:16 (CEST)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Lou Montana|Lou Montana]]</dt>
<dd class="note">This command doesn't work, in '''Arma 2 1.05'''.


<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
